attributes.action: Prime to resign for failing to negotiate a free trade agreement with EU
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson placed on record on numerous occasions that he would negotiate a free trade agreement with the EU 
It was central to the Conservative Party Manifesto and was repeated on numerous occasions in the House of Commons 
He has mislead Parliament and has mislead the Nation
attributes.background: Boris Johnson promised the UK electorate that he would negotiate a deal with the European Union, he has failed

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.
